privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.section1Desc: Plagaiscans Technologies Ltd (United Kingdom), operating as PlagaiScans, is the data controller responsible for your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.
privacyPolicy.section2Intro: We collect the following types of information:
privacyPolicy.documentItem2: Document metadata (file name, size, upload time)
privacyPolicy.paymentItem2: Payment method used (we do not store full card details)
privacyPolicy.useItem1: Provide and maintain our document analysis services
privacyPolicy.useItem2: Process your transactions and manage your account
privacyPolicy.useItem4: Respond to your inquiries and provide customer support
privacyPolicy.useItem5: Improve our services and develop new features
privacyPolicy.section4Intro: Under data protection laws, you have the following rights:
privacyPolicy.rightAccessDesc: Request a copy of your personal data
privacyPolicy.rightErasureDesc: Request deletion of your data ("right to be forgotten")
privacyPolicy.section5Intro: For questions about this Privacy Policy or to exercise your rights, please contact us at:

termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
termsAndConditions.section1Desc: Welcome to PlagaiScans. These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.
termsAndConditions.section2Intro: PlagaiScans provides AI-assisted similarity analysis and plagiarism detection services for documents. Our services include:
termsAndConditions.serviceItem1: Document similarity analysis against academic and web sources
termsAndConditions.serviceItem3: Detailed PDF reports with analysis results
termsAndConditions.responsibilityItem1: Maintaining the confidentiality of their account credentials
termsAndConditions.responsibilityItem2: All activities that occur under their account
termsAndConditions.responsibilityItem3: Ensuring that submitted documents do not violate any third-party rights
termsAndConditions.section4Intro: Our services operate on a credit-based system. Credits can be purchased through:
termsAndConditions.creditItem1: One-time packages: Credits with a defined validity period
termsAndConditions.creditItem2: Subscription plans: Monthly recurring credits that renew automatically
termsAndConditions.section5Desc: All refund requests are reviewed and managed by our admin team on a case-by-case basis.
termsAndConditions.section6Intro: For questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at:

refundPolicy.title: Refund Policy
refundPolicy.refundWindowDesc: We offer a 14-day refund window from the date of purchase. If you haven't used any of your purchased credits within this period, you're eligible to request a full refund.
refundPolicy.refundWindowItem1: Request must be made within 14 days of purchase
refundPolicy.refundWindowItem2: Credits must be unused (0 credits consumed)
refundPolicy.refundWindowItem3: Full refund to your original payment method
refundPolicy.adminReviewDesc: All refund requests are personally reviewed by our admin team to ensure fair and consistent handling. Here's what to expect:
refundPolicy.eligible14Day: 14-day window: Request made within 14 days of purchase with no credits used
refundPolicy.eligibleTechnical: Technical errors: System failures that prevented service delivery
refundPolicy.eligibleDuplicate: Duplicate charges: You were accidentally charged twice for the same purchase
refundPolicy.notEligibleUsed: Credits have already been used (even partially)
refundPolicy.notEligibleExpired: Request made after 14 days from purchase date
refundPolicy.notEligibleMind: Change of mind or no longer needing credits
refundPolicy.requestReviewDesc: Our admin team will review your case within 24-48 hours
refundPolicy.reasonPlaceholder: Please explain your situation in detail...
